meta.description: The sad reality in which we sometimes live in is expressed through 20 pictures based on humour but are also rather shocking. The following images tell the truth: they present life's stereotypes, everyday habits as well as the bad role of technology in our lives.

title: 20 Shocking Pictures Illustrate The Sad Reality Of Everyday Life
cleaned_text:
The sad reality in which we sometimes live in is expressed through 20 pictures based on humour but are also rather shocking. The following images tell the truth: they present life's stereotypes, everyday habits as well as the bad role of technology in our lives.

Take a look at the pictures:
• These 12 Satirical Cartoons Depict The Disturbing Reality Of Modern-Day Society
• More Disturbing (But Amazing) Pictures Expose The Absurdities Of Modern Culture *Warning: Graphic Images*
• Disturbing (But Amazing) Pictures Expose The Absurdities Of Modern Culture *Warning: Graphic Images*
• These 29 Clever Drawings Will Make You Question Everything Wrong With The World
• What if Animals Treated Us How We Treat Them?
• These 30+ Cartoons Illustrate How Smartphones Are The Death Of Conversation
• This Hilarious Comic Illustrates The Continuous Fight Between Our Heart And Our Brain
• This Comic Will Forever Change the Way You Look at Privilege
• “Where there is love there is life!” -Mahatma Gandhi
• Powerful Satirical Illustrations Show What War Really Looks Like
• Korean Artist Beautifully Captures What Real Love Truly Looks Like
• 10 Heartwarming Sketches About Love and Romance by Zac Retz!
• Heartwarming Illustrations Show That True Love Is In The Little Everyday Things
• How Women in Iconic Paintings Would Look if They Got Photoshopped to Fit Today's Ideals
• How French Artists In 1899 Envisioned Life In The Year 2000
• You Are Free To Make Choices In Life But You Are Not Free From The Consequences Of Those Choices
